website_summaries.verdict: An extra-large mirror that's suitable and reassuring for parents of infants in rear-facing car seats.
pros: Straps that anchor mirror are easy to tighten
Parents get peace of mind from a quality product
cons: Careful adjustments are needed to prevent sliding
Rare complaints of poor mechanical durability

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The back piece was difficult to snap into the underside of the mirror. I wasn’t able to do it myself but my husband got it after several tries. The mirror is a standard size and allows me to see one of the rear facing car seats but not both. The straps hold it securely to the headrest but if we go over big bumps or potholes it does slide down and have to be readjusted. This isn’t any better or worse than the Chicco mirrors we have in our other car.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Best baby mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is the best one yet. I have small head rests in my car (2015 Ford Fusion) and the other mirrors I have tried with the Velcro stink and don't stay in place. This mirror has secure clips so that the mirror stays in place. The mirror moves using a little pivot and stays wherever you place it. It also is super clear and looks like an actual mirror- where as other mirrors are blurry and aren't as clear. It's also the perfect size- big enough to see your little munchkin, but not too big that it becomes distracting while driving. I will definitely be gifting this mirror to other mommys to be!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than most, sturdy and perfect price point- must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Two thumbs up for this super easy to install and sturdy plus large mirror. I had two Eddie Bauer mirrors before (not 360) and was not in love with them though they did work ok. But boy, let me tell ya when I saw this mirror in my friends minivan and she told me she got it on amazon I had to order it because of how sturdy it seemed not to mention the toddler can’t kick it around as easily as he could the other ones we had. Definitely will be recommending to my other mommy friends!
customer_reviews.author: MssyNorX

customer_reviews.title: Less distortion than big brand name
customer_reviews.text: I could’ve bought the same mirror my wife has in her car but I wanted better. The Britax mirror from Toys R Us has image distortion in the corners. I know I know this mirror is suppose to distort the reflection to show you more than a flat mirror of the same size, but THIS mirror keeps the reflection more consistant all the way to the edges. It also matches my black on black interior and tightens up to my rear headrests easily. My daughter loves to make faces to herself while we drive on longer trips. It’s fun to see her being herself
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any others to compare it to but this mirror is well made, large, and secures easily to seat, adjust in every direction, which allows for the perfect angle to be found. We love we can see our daughter in her rear-facing car seat while we are driving... & she must be able to see us too b/c she is clapping and laughing & happier! Overall she seems less cranky in the car! That is a huge feat for a 15 m.o.! Wish we would've bought this sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mirror! Best peace of mind, and no Adjusting!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best car seat mirrors I have ever seen! All my friends comment on how they wish they had ones like mine, and hadn’t bought one based on how it looked. So many of my friends end up putting towels and other things behind their mirrors to get them to the right angle, and they are always having to adjust them. The only time I have to adjust mine are when I bump them myself. They always stay in place going down the road. Which is so important with twins!
customer_reviews.author: K B.

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror and cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my newborn and 2 other toddlers. All 3 kids are lined up and this is the first I've purchased this mirror and wish I could've saved lots and found this sooner for my other two. They have mirrors as well but I can't see them too well and have to adjust my mirror to see them but lose sight of rear view and blind spots which defeats the purpose but this mirror has such a wide view and is super sturdy! Extremely easy to install too. Hands down best mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: My wife slid behind the wheel, looked in the rear view mirror, and smiled...
customer_reviews.text: Our precious baby is my wife's first baby. She didn't want to drive unless she could see him, so I've been chauffeur. No problem, but the day was coming when she would need to drive, no chauffeur. I kept talking about installing a camera/monitor system; she bought this. The day came she needed to drive and there was no camera/monitor installed. I installed this quickly and easily to the middle seat headrest in our midsize SUV. Winner. Low tech, reliable solution.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Murphy

customer_reviews.title: best mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install took about 10 seconds and I was held up great and I can see my son perfectly when I look in my rearview mirror. No glare not too shiny I read a lot of reviews and this is definitely the one you need to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but don't pull straps too hard!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, however be careful when installing on headrest of seat. If you pull the straps too hard on these, one of the strap snaps and it isn't as secure (as my husband did on BOTH of these we purchased for our cars). Maybe he doesn't know his own strength, but the fact it happened on both makes me think that the clips are just a bit weak. The mirror still works wonderfully, but tends to bounce a bit more with the bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, poor design.
customer_reviews.text: I love how large the mirror is, but it is poorly designed. The components that allow for the pivot function also allow for lots of extra movement while driving, the mirror vibrates a lot. It’s really terrible on the highway, to the point of almost being useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for being able to see my Grandson in his rear facing car seat!
customer_reviews.text: When driving I was unable to see my grandson in the rear facing car seat. This mirror was just perfect for not getting in the way of my rear vision in the car and still allows me to see him in the car seat. Easy to assemble and install and can be easily removed from the rear headrest when he is not in the car. Gives me more peace of mind when travelling with him as I can easily see what he is doing, and anytime you have an active toddler in a rear facing car seat, you want to know what they are up to.
customer_reviews.author: Die Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror...and I tried several!
customer_reviews.text: This was the third backseat mirror I tried. The others were flat and I could not see my child. This one is nicely curved/concave and it's adjustable so you can aim it exactly in the direction you need it. We bought one for each of our vehicles and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. King

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: It's a big mirror that stays in place, can be pivoted if needed, and permits you to see your LO in the back seat clearly. Don't get those show-boaty ones with characters. Stick with function over style. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: Staple!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a staple for rear facing car seats. However, I get lots of moms who asks me where I got this mirror. I like knowing that my little one is content or know why she is crying when I am driving. It attaches to the headrest either to the side or in front of the infant. My baby also likes to look at herself while I am driving. It keeps her occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn FieldingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of the mirror so I can see ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the mirror so I can see my newborn but the straps won’t stay tight. I had to tie a knot in both straps just to make them stay tight. I the mirror is heavy so if it falls while I’m driving it could hurt my baby by falling on her. If the straps would stay tight like they are suppose to I would give a better rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: -Quick and easy assembly, basically side the mirror on to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Quick and easy assembly, basically side the mirror on to the mount. -Super big mirror makes it easy to adjust for views of my little one. -Altogether took less than 5 minutes to assemble and put in my car. Cons: Attaches to headrest with two straps- If they are too tight the top one slides off the top of the headrest, too loose and it swings out of position.
customer_reviews.author: Anna P.

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to install and even easier to adjust when we ...
customer_reviews.text: It is stressful driving in a car without knowing if your baby is okay or not. This mirror fixed the problem. It was very easy to install and even easier to adjust when we need to. My baby even loves to look and talk to himself in it so it keeps him busy and happier during car rides.
customer_reviews.author: Haley B.

customer_reviews.title: Installs in less than 5 minutes, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: 5 minutes installation, so far works great! I bought a more expensive one at a retailer that as not good. Was looking for something that was adjustable independent of the installation in the headrest. This one delivers!! Time will tell if it stays sturdy so I don’t have to adjust it.... but so far this is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: 1review

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and they work great. I have a Ford Taurus and my husband has a Chrysler mini-van. The mirrors work perfectly in both types of cars with the different types of seats. We can see our baby easily using the review mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is awesome - it's big and clear
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is awesome - it's big and clear. My backseat head rest is not adjustable though, so, I've got it buckled around the sides and then I've taken a latch clip from my old mirror and will affix it to the top strap so I can secure it down so it doesn't fly off into my baby's face (if God forbid I were to be in an accident). It wouldve been nice to sell it with a modification of this sort, this is the only reasoning giving it 4/5 stars. It otherwise is great!
customer_reviews.author: Yo Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Big
customer_reviews.text: This is EASY to install. I don't install things, that's my husbands thing. However, I wanted this for my first outing that included just the baby and me. It took less than 5 minutes to tear open the box for installation and then to be pulling the car out of my driveway. Mirror is BIG! I can clearly see my newborns face in the rear view mirror. I expected it to be difficult to see her but the system stays put and magnifies her face so I don't have any worries while on the road.
customer_reviews.author: ebilbo

customer_reviews.title: Bought another for the second car
customer_reviews.text: Still awesome. Bought a second one for our other car. This one doesn't have a center headrest so we put it on the adjacent seat and with the 360 pivot, it works great angled towards the center. Love the large viewing area. This set up doesn't block as much of the rear view mirror so we like it a bit better. Great, clear view. We are still expecting for another week or so so we are using a carebear in the car seat to practice in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Adnilasor2

customer_reviews.title: I love how big this mirror is
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this mirror is. I've gone through 2 others so far (one was a fancy light up one that never sat properly on the headrest so I was always either looking at his feet or the roof of the car) and the other was big enough for me to see my baby's face but he couldn't see himself and he's at a stage (6 months) where he LOVES looking at himself in the mirror! This is large enough so I can see his head and most of his body, and he can see himself too! I definitely wish this mirror had been on my registry!
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: To view baby in the back seat
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter for my grandson’s first Christmas. He’s only 2 1/2 months and staying awake longer, so she would like to see what he’s doing in the back seat. She had friends recommend this but my daughter hasn’t tried it yet. They were very excited to get it yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Abby's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Giggles and Grins included!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I own two of these mirrors. One for my car and one for his, it's great to be able to look at with our child while driving. She gets a kick out of seeing her self and gets all giggly when you say, "hello" or just smile at her. We love this mirror, just wish this model didn't need to be strapped to a headrest otherwise I would be buying one for our beautiful baby girl's grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah1985

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of this mirror last June for our cars and had to replace both in November. We thought maybe it was user error, but the second set we bought have also now fallen apart. They do not stand up well to moving headrests or cars. Neither car has been in an accident since owning these mirrors so it's not that. They just don't hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Boutcher Family

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror! Love the fact that you can adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! Love the fact that you can adjust the angle so that you can more readily see the babe in the car seat. I had received another mirror as a gift that has a fabric edge and it is not adjustable besides the Velcro strap part that attaches to the headrest. It was way too high- from my rear view mirror I only would see half of my child's face and mostly the top of the car seat. Plus the fabric edge decreased the size of the actual mirror part. So I ended up ordering this mirror, the one I originally wanted. I think it's the best out there that I've seen yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This baby mirror is perfect for making sure your little one is ok. It always brings me peace of mind when I look back and I know if she's just being quiet because she's sleeping or if she stuck her sock in her mouth and is having trouble breathing (lol) The swivel mirror is convenient and makes it easy to adjust as they grow. The only con about this mirror is sometimes it's sensitive and when you brush against, it will move, but for the price for a good mirror that actually fits my large backseat headrests, I will take the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Woodard

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I almost always try to avoid writing bad reviews. But: Cheap piece of plastic that sets the mirror up BROKE and FELL on my baby while in the car!! (He’s okay but it startled him) I was so upset about this. The only good part about it was that they gave me a full refund promptly. Didn’t even try to replace it because they know it sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backseat mirror! I had another brand before but it wasn’t on a swivel and kept sliding down. This one stays in place and I can put it on the seat next to her so baby can still watch her tablet on long drives! I can see her much better in this mirror as well. It’s large and clear and baby can see me more too, which makes her a happier baby in the car. I definitely would purchase this for a friend if they needed one! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne S

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is great size, quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this so my grandson who is too young to face forward in his car seat could watch the DVDs screen. The mirror is great size,quality, and easy to install. However when it arrived it is convexed not fla. so the DVDs screen is very small in the mirror. The convexed give a wider angel to keep an eye on the child. However the description did not give any information on mirror shape. It is clear and great size. Most likely send it back and purchase a flat mirror
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Love this baby mirror so much I bought an additional ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this baby mirror so much I bought an additional one for my husbands truck. Absolutely love the size and how it is easily adjustable. The straps go horizontally around the head rest and also vertically. The only complaint I have is that it seems a little loose at the part where the mirror is attached at the base and by loose I mean that it makes a wrattling noise most of the time I am driving (it doesn't appear loose in the sense that I think it would fall apart while driving).
customer_reviews.author: agill

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: ❤️❤️❤️ This! The wide mirror is perfect for my car, lets me install this in the middle seat and angle to see my son in his rear facing car seat behind me. Easy to install and adjust. Sturdy and so far no fogging of the mirror. Great purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as described. It was easy to install and works well. I mounted it on the back of a seat in the second row of my Subaru Outback. I can see my son when I drive and the mirror doesn't bounce around even when we are driving on a road full of potholes. I paid full price for this product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Short term purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mirror for 8 months. We had one for each car. As soon as it got hot though - they both broke. The plastic on the mount doesn't hold up. Guess I'll have to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Mirror keeps snapping off
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product three times...because the mirror keeps snapping off and breaking. The first time was in winter so I gave it the benefit of the doubt. The next two times happened during normal driving. I can’t worry about a large mirror snapping off onto my babies, let alone having to keep replacing. Very disappointed and would not recommend for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Long

customer_reviews.title: good ro see babies.
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the mirrors that we bought. It is fantastic to be able to see our baby is okay in the back seat of the car has Clarence sometimes you can't help but wonder when there is silence what that means or if the babies are happy or fussy. It is wonderful to be able to see those things.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Big and clear!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is fantastic! Attached securely and easily, tilts to allow for the perfect angle, and it's HUGE! I've had other mirrors in the past that were so small and the mirror was so hard to see the baby, this one is perfect! I can see my daughter perfectly from my rear view mirror. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: cbosley

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror, designed for adjustable headrests.
customer_reviews.text: Wide Clear curved mirror gives great range of vision to my grandbabe in the back seat . The straps to secure the mirror to back headrest are adjustable, however they don't fit my car's headrests which are molded into seat not separate adjustable like the front. I tied the mirror to the tether anchor in the back window. Not perfect but functional.
customer_reviews.author: goodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Very wide and bright. Excellent Mirror. Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rear view mirror. It's very wide, clean and bright. I was able to see baby in low light conditions too. Easy to install. Stays pretty firm once straps are tightened. It's so wide that even the co-passenger in the front can also look at what baby is doing, which I believe is very helpful. Much better than the other crap out in the market that I have already tried.
customer_reviews.author: Nisarg

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. Was easy to attach to the headrest of the backseat. Its large and the view is very clear. Im very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mariam LOUTFI

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for a few days but it is great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for a few days but it is great so far. The assembly and installation was very easy and it provides a nice clear view of the car seat. It is very adjustable and could be easily transferred from one car to another. It will be interesting to see how the ball joint behind the mirror that allows for positional adjustments holds up over time and if the mirror is allowed to pivot downward when hitting bumps in the road.
customer_reviews.author: Evan B

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mirror I've bought for my rear facing child, and I'm so happy with it! The first mirror I bought was too small and attached to my rear mirror, which I didn't like. I installed it within minutes, and the instructions were very clear and simple. The mirror is very large, but since it attaches to the headrest I don't lose any view of my rear window. I can see baby very clearly, and am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Brown

customer_reviews.title: I’m super bummed because this mirror is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this mirror less than a week and the back hole in the mirror broke and I can no longer hang it. I’m super bummed because this mirror is GREAT!! HUGE!! The plastic where the ball hitches to the mirror started to chip off as if it was weather beaten or just old. :(
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE: Broke at Joint So Can't Adjust Angle
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews before buying this mirror. It worked great at first... Until the ball/socket joint somehow broke. This means that if we try to angle the mirror toward our son, it doesn't stay in place. In other words, we can't see our son in the mirror, and it's now another useless piece of plastic. I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: simplethings37

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I love the mirror. Came quickly and I was able to set it up very easily. I love being able to see what my little ones are doing in their rear facing car seats. And I can tell they sometimes look at me through it. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amnona

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this mirror. I love that you can angle it and the wide view is much better than the other mirror we have in our other vehicle. It was absolutely simple to install, completely headache free! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dini

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I wanted to put my carseat directly behind my driver's seat for easier access to my child. Strapped it to the middle seat and it gives a full view of the carseat with no problems. Easy to install, hasn't slid around, holds its position. Perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: MStapley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time, but had a small crack. We thought we would give it a try and install the mirror anyway and see if it could still be used. Thank goodness it broke and fell into the car seat before the baby was born. But also, what a waste of money and a cheaply-made product. Had to reorder a different brand of car seat mirror one week before baby was born.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McCorkell

customer_reviews.title: mostly great; would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Very easy to install and gives a good view of my baby. She loves looking at herself in it, too (she's a little narcissist, apparently). Only complaint is that it often vibrates quite a bit, but to be honest I haven't tinkered with it enough yet to be able to say that's not fixable. I did try tightening the straps and that didn't help. But not a dealbreaker—it's still accomplishing what I need it to, which is helping me figure out when she falls asleep on longer drives.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Kimball

customer_reviews.title: ... bigger than I thought it would be which is awesome! Baby likes look back at me when driving ...
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was a lot bigger than I thought it would be which is awesome! Baby likes look back at me when driving and now its no longer a guessing game if he's sleeping in the back or not.
customer_reviews.author: animationgirl43

customer_reviews.title: Large mirror makes viewing baby a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was absolutely what we were looking for to use for our newborn son. This mirror is larger than the one I used with my daughter which makes it easy for the both the passenger & the driver (with the rear view mirror) to keep an eye on baby. It was easy to install and is of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Big mirror to see your baby's big smiles
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is bigger than anticipated (I didn't bother to look at the product dimensions before ordering). It has been handy to see when our son is asleep or if the sun is in his eyes. He also likes to smile and wave at us in the mirror and that alone makes this mirror worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Works well! I haven't had any issues with it falling apart or falling off the headrest. It's exactly what I was hoping for. I'll update if any problems develop. I will mention that I added a few pieces of paper into slide where the mirror attaches to the base unit so it has less wobble to it as I drive down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for keeping an eye on the baby!
customer_reviews.text: This is a large mirror, and easy to install. I've now bought 3 of these, after being sooo happy with the first one. I put them in my daughter's and her husband's cars, and got one for the grandparents' car. Easy to adjust, so that the baby (rear facing car seat) can be seen through the rear view mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I think I need to buy another one actually. I already purchased a mirror for my car at a local store but it never quite stays where I need it to. I bought this one for my mom's minivan which we use quite often. This mirror stays exactly where it should and is very large and clear so I can see my beautiful baby girl playing in her car seat wherever we go!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great .
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my bay didn't have to arch her neck & turn her head to see me. Car is in the shop. Hadn't been able to try it yet but anxious to do so. Looks like it will cover the hole back seat & make me visible to my toddler & her to me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this mirror. He stares and stares at himself in the car. He's completely mesmerized. Then he usually drifts off to sleep. It's also a great size so we can easily see him in the rear view while driving. We couldn't take car trips without it!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Asquith

customer_reviews.title: Best baby mirror!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MIRROR!! Exactly what I needed, my cars headrest doesn’t go up and I had a mirror that was smaller than this one it would slide everywhere unsecured, this one is very big and I can see my baby the mirror stays pit and it’s super easy to adjust
customer_reviews.author: Amanda 💙

customer_reviews.title: This was great for a while but then a small piece where ...
customer_reviews.text: This was great for a while but then a small piece where it attaches to the base broke off. Probably in the first month or two. It still works but every time my daughter gets in the car she kicks it off...usually on purpose. On the hunt for a different mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wegner

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I feel safe being able to see my ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Works great and I feel safe being able to see my baby while I’m driving! And she enjoys seeing herself to! Lil
customer_reviews.author: BlessedMama

customer_reviews.title: I know she's safe
customer_reviews.text: It's great having the peace of mind of simply glancing & knowing your baby is doing ok. I know right away if I need to pull over, or if she's really ok. A must have for all parents for rear facing baby car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Does the job great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love having this in my car! Really comforting to be able to see my babes while I am driving without putting ourselves at risk. Easy to install! Right now we are frequently switching it between my husbands and my car since it is pretty easy. But just to save time I would like to order another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was exactly what I expected. Arrived on time. Installed perfectly. Nice big clear display. BUT my car seat didn't fit behind my seat. Only in the center of the backseat and I don't have a headrest in the middle to install it. I replied to customer service's request to know about delivery and as soon as they heard I couldn't use it. EVEN THOUGH THE PRODUCT WAS PERFECT. They automatically returned my money without even asking for me to return it. Amazing. I passed it along to a friend who's having a hard time and probably wouldn't have purchased one herself.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mullin

customer_reviews.title: I love how big this guy is
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this guy is! It doesn't matter if I'm driving or my husband is driving, we don't have to readjust the mirror to each other's vision. Anyway I can find similplicity, I find myself happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount. Great visibility. Easy to install. Well constructed (worth the price paid). BONUS: My baby girl loves to make faces at herself in the mirror and is now much happier on car trips! I am happy with my purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ripley M Johnson
